name: Go, Spinny Jr
description:
Spinny Jr is a character I imagined a long time ago. I made a game about him at MyGameBuilder.com, before something happened to the site. I wanted to breathe new life into this old idea, and this is the result so far. Maybe I will keep adding to it.

Related: Spinny Jr

Controls

Arrows/WASD: move,

F: toggle fullscreen,

Backspace: reset game,

Escape: close game

Gameplay

Avoid things. Touch things. There isn't much to it.

Style inspired by Caverns of Zeux for the MegaZeux.

Includes ReadMe.
